Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Crusher \Crush"er\ (-?r), n. One who, or that which, crushes. [1913 Webster]
{Crusher gauge}, an instrument for measuring the explosive force of gunpowder, etc., by its effect in compressing a piece of metal. [1913 Webster]
crusher n : a device that crushes something
